main.name: Porsche Herskorn
main.bio: My name is Porsche. I'm a new to the coding world and currently seeking a full-time junior developer position.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me for further details.

resume.skillmessage: Download my Resume for more details on my experience.

education.degree: Diploma in Full Stack Web Development
education.description: A 24-week intensive program focused on gaining technical programming skills in HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, JQuery, Bootstrap, Firebase, Node Js, MySQL, MongoDB, Express, Handelbars.js & ReactJS.

work.title: Registered Dental Assistant
work.description: Support a team of 3 dentists by preparing operation sites, assisting with surgical procedures, and maintaining instrument sterilization.

projects.title: Coming Soon
projects.category: Coming Soon is a single-page application built using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) that empowers users to create, manage, and attend events effortlessly.

projects.title: Parks Planner
projects.category: a server-side API driven web app to provide users with a list of national parks of a selected state and trails in the the selected area. (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, API)

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.category: View the 5-day forecast of a selected city via dynamically updated HTML and CSS. (HTML, CSS, JavScript, Bootstrap, API)

projects.title: Identifying Hex Codes with Regex
projects.category: A comprehensive guide to regular expressions for identifying hex codes, deployed via GitHub's Gist.

projects.title: Dev Gab
projects.category: A content-management-style (CMS) blog site where developers in the tech industry can post articles in areas relating to the tech industry. (HTML, CSS, HandleBars.js, MySQL2)

testimonials.text: Porsche knew exactly what we wanted! Our website looks amazing and the turn around time was really quick.
Thanks to Porsche, most of our customers visit our store via Social Media.
